meanings.definition: To eject or discharge suddenly and forcefully.
meanings.sent1: He was so excited that he couldn't help ejaculating his joy through a loud shout.
meanings.sent2: The volcano erupted, ejaculating hot lava into the air.
meanings.sent3: The pressure in the soda bottle built up so much that it started ejaculating soda everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The burst pipe was ejaculating water with great force, flooding the basement.
meanings.sent5: The burst of confetti from the cannon was like ejaculating a rainbow into the sky.

meanings.sent1: Startled by the noise, she ended up ejaculating a scream before realizing it was just a car backfiring.
meanings.sent2: During the meeting, he kept ejaculating short comments that added to the discussion.
meanings.sent3: The comedian had a habit of ejaculating one-liners that always made the audience laugh.
meanings.sent4: In the heat of the argument, she couldn't help ejaculating a sharp retort.
meanings.sent5: The teacher would often ejaculate important reminders to the students during class.

meanings.definition: To expel semen from the body.
meanings.sent1: The male seahorse is unique as it is the one ejaculating the eggs into the female's pouch.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the process of ejaculating sperm during the reproductive cycle.
meanings.sent3: The biology class discussed the various methods of ejaculating semen for fertilization.
meanings.sent4: The researcher studied the effects of different foods on ejaculating sperm count.
meanings.sent5: The fertility clinic provided guidance on techniques for ejaculating semen samples for analysis.
